amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for economic assistance to Egypt.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in the Congressional Record to transfer $570 million in military assistance for Egypt to economic aid for Egypt.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lantos amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 131 - 287 (Roll no. 381).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Lantos.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lantos amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 131 - 287 (Roll no. 381).
